Here's the diff that actually fixes the problem, no actually I swear:

diff --git a/torch/nn/parameter.py b/torch/nn/parameter.py
index 1035b0705..1169fff0f 100644
--- a/torch/nn/parameter.py
+++ b/torch/nn/parameter.py
@@ -30,5 +30,5 @@ class Parameter(torch.Tensor):
     def __reduce_ex__(self, proto):
         return (
             torch._utils._rebuild_parameter,
-            (self.data, self.requires_grad, self._backward_hooks)
+            (self.data, self.requires_grad, None)
         )

but I need to work out if this is the right thing to do.
